For all client-side files in this Next.js TypeScript project, include the 'use client' directive at the top of the file to enable client-side rendering. Ensure that all code adheres to TypeScript best practices and is fully type-safe.
Implement error handling with try, catch and finally blocks, for API calls and user interactions, providing meaningful feedback to users in case of failures.
Use base url configuration for API calls to ensure consistency across the application.
Ensure that all components are functional components and utilize React hooks where appropriate.
